text: Herbert Harry Mann (30 December 1907 – 24 April 1977) was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Nuneaton, Warwickshire. He played for Griff Colliery, Derby County, Grantham Town, Ripley Town, and Manchester United. ==References== ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1907 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Nuneaton Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Grantham Town F.C. players Category:Ripley Town F.C. players
title: Herbert Mann
